With this Core series I have reached my current possebilities, I am not able to add more units on a processor. In this series I upgraded the connectors inside the core to gold ones, beacuse gold have much better conductivity.
I reached an other improvment by adding an build-in unit for the processing and the ouput of Support data. This extremly relieved the unspecified part of the processor.
